message.content:
Figure is a cloud-based design and prototyping tool that allows users to create interactive mockups of websites, mobile apps, and other digital products. It supports multiple platforms such as iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, and more, and offers features like drag-and-drop interface building, CSS previews, responsive design, and accessibility testing.

Users can work collaboratively on designs in real-time with Figma's version control system, allowing teams to easily share their work and get feedback from team members or stakeholders. Additionally, Figma offers a range of templates, icons, and assets that users can use as a starting point for their designs.

The tool is free for basic usage, but also offers paid plans with more advanced features such as custom branding, additional design templates, and increased collaboration capabilities.
